backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing resume storage, user profiles, coaching results, and access control with CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata documenting a feature request and related files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables and theme styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication flow, routing setup, and profile-setup modal display.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting first‑time users for their name and saving the profile via mutation.
frontend/src/components/coaching/Suggest: UI component grouping coaching suggestions by section with category icons and styled cards.
frontend/src/components/common/ErrorStat: Reusable error UI showing an alert with optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/common/FormError: Displays a list of validation errors inside a destructive alert.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingSt: Centered loading indicator with optional status message.
frontend/src/components/resume/ExportBut: Button triggering browser print for exporting the resume as PDF.
frontend/src/components/resume/ResumeLis: Renders a resume card with actions for editing, previewing, coaching, duplicating, and deleting a resume. Handles navigation and async operations for duplication and deletion.
frontend/src/components/resume/ResumePre: Displays a formatted preview of a resume, including basics, summary, experience, and education sections. Uses deserialized data to render structured resume content.
frontend/src/components/resume/SectionBa: Form section for editing basic contact details like name, email, phone, location, and website. Updates parent state on field changes.
frontend/src/components/resume/SectionEd: Editor for managing education entries with add, remove, reorder, and expand/collapse functionality. Allows updating fields for each education item.
frontend/src/components/resume/SectionEx: Editor for managing work experience entries with add, remove, reorder, and expand/collapse controls. Supports updating details for each experience item.
frontend/src/components/resume/SectionSk: Manages a list of skills with add, remove, and input handling. Displays skills as badges and provides tips for effective skill selection.
frontend/src/components/resume/SectionSu: Form for editing the professional summary text with character count feedback. Includes guidance for writing an effective summary.
frontend/src/components/resume/serialize: Serializes resume form data into section arrays and deserializes stored sections back into structured resume form data.
frontend/src/components/shell/AppShell.t: Provides the main application layout with header, footer, identity display, and logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCoaching.ts: Fetches coaching-enhanced resumes and runs coaching mutations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useResumes.ts: Provides queries and mutations for CRUD operations on resumes using the backend actor with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Loads and saves the current user's profile through the backend actor with query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, CSS variables for themes, and print-specific styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with query and identity providers before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/CoachingPage.tsx: Displays AI resume coaching results, handles loading/error states, and allows running or re-running coaching for a given resume.
frontend/src/pages/ResumeEditorPage.tsx: Provides a full resume editor with validation, autoset form data from API, and controls for saving, previewing, and coaching.
frontend/src/pages/ResumeListPage.tsx: Lists all resumes, supports creating a new one, and handles loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/ResumePreviewPage.tsx: Shows a formatted preview of a resume with export options and basic navigation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL or session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, existing features, and known issues for a resume builder app. Indicates a missing Internet Identity sign‑in button and marks this as a fix request.
